member.name: P:WifiPhoneApp1.App.RootFrame
member.summary: Provides easy access to the root frame of the Phone Application.
member.returns: The root frame of the Phone Application.

member.name: M:WifiPhoneApp1.SocketClient.Connect(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Attempt a TCP socket connection to the given host over the given port
member.returns: A string representing the result of this connection attempt

member.name: M:WifiPhoneApp1.SocketClient.Send(System.String)
member.summary: Send the given string data to the server using the established connection
member.param: The data to send to the server
member.returns: The result of the Send request

member.name: M:WifiPhoneApp1.SocketClient.Send(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Send the given raw data (in a byte stream) to the server using the established connection
member.param: The raw byte data to send to the server
member.returns: The result of the Send request
